name: Qbi
description:
Qbi is a tiny robot whose sole purpose is restoring light to the world! The only thing is, he can't actually control when he fires orbs of light.

Help Qbi navigate puzzles and restore the dormant light bulbs of the world!

____________________________

Controls:

Move: WASD

Restart Level: R

Exit Level: Enter

Shoot: N/A

This game was made within 48 hours for the Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam 2020.
